levels.description: Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, Attack Range expands; Each attack targets 2 enemies, prioritizes blocked enemies, deals <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage and drags them towards this unit <@ba.vup>slightly</>
